name: Thermostat 8
description:
The heat is decreasing in the cavern, you need to go mine all the combustible ore in the cave to keep the furnace running and keep the cave warm. If you averheat the furnace, the heat will go down and a coin will be forged for you to purchase some equipments and upgrades. Good luck miner !

Game developped with a team of 4 friend in 2 days for the Lyon E-ArtJam, with the theme elevate.
